mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, TMP.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT c.cart_no, c.cart_item_no, c.users_id, c.cart_qty, c.volume_no AS cart_volume_no, p.product_no AS p_product_no, p.product_name, p.product_detail, p.product_price, p.strength, p.brand_name, p.top_note, p.middle_note, p.base_note, p.attachment_name, p.attachment_type, p.attachment_size, p.image_url, v.volume_no AS v_volume_no, v.product_no AS v_product_no, v.volume_ml, v.volume_stock, v.volume_price, v.discounted_volume_price FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN product_detail_view p ON c.cart_item_no = p.product_no LEFT OUTER JOIN volume v ON c.volume_no = v.volume_no AND c.cart_item_no = v.product_no WHERE c.users_id = #{usersId} ORDER BY c.cart_no DESC ) TMP ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT c.*, p.* FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN product_detail_view p ON c.cart_item_no = p.product_no WHERE c.users_id = #{usersId} AND c.cart_item_no = #{cartItemNo} ORDER BY c.cart_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cart_no, cart_item_no, users_id, cart_qty, volume_no) VALUES(#{cartNo}, #{cartItemNo}, #{usersId}, #{cartQty}, #{volumeNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE users_id = #{usersId} AND cart_no = #{cartNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE users_id = #{usersId}
